task_background: Prepare the train maintenance depot for an upcoming safety inspection by organizing tools, repairing equipment, and ensuring all safety protocols are followed.

tasks.task_description: Place the inspection_tablet_1 on the desk_1.
Find the heaviest, metal object in the tool_cart_1 and place it on the inspection_tablet_1.
Use the wrench_1 to disassemble the brake_assembly_1.
Use the wrench_1 to disassemble the only object in the train_inspection_bay that is both metal and has a condition of 'dented'.
